messages.message: Thank you for all the good times Bae! We are all proud of you! Let's have even more fun in the future!

Thank you Bae, for being my favourite Aussie content creator and being the reason I am still here to enjoy you and Hololive, with all the amazing work you do and smiles you bring, love your work and all you do, JDON your soul!!!

Hello! Thank you for all the hard work you put into your performances. I always look forward to them. I started watching vtubers at a very low point in my life, and couldn't have gotten through it without you, Council, or the rest of Holopro.

messages.sender_title: Perpetually Genki Artist, Herald of Chaos
messages.message: Hey Bae, congrats on reaching 1M subs!!! I've been watching you for almost 3 years now and I can say you more than deserve it, with how hardworking, dedicated and amazing you are!!! You've been an huge source of inspiration and motivation in these years, if not for you I'd have given up on drawing long ago and never would've found this amazing community! I'll keep supporting you no matter what, onwards to many more millions and many more amazing achievements! Love you Bae, forever my kamioshi!!!
Baaaeeeee!!!!! Look at you hitting the big Mil. Congrats! Knew you could do it. It’s been such a journey watching you grow, you’ve made me laugh, cry and  everything inbetween. Luv you goofy rat.
Hi Bae, you make my days better with your stream, songs and plushies :)
CONGRATULATIONS for hitting 1 million subs Bae! You're our #1 cutest idol gamer rat!

I'm a new Brat but in these 2-3 months, you've already charmed me with your singing, dancing, performances (3D lives etc), your interests (Kpop fangirling etc), all the streams and stream moments (the pons, oversleeping, reactions to game content/superchats). 

But on top of that, I truly appreciate your drive, dedication and discipline to push yourself to do your best, to pursue your goals and dreams.

Thank you for everything you've given us. I regret not finding you sooner. Happy 1M!

From the day you jumped down from the rat wheel, you've always been head strong and resilient. These past 3 years I've seen this tiny cute rat turn into a dependable, dorky, loving and overall hardworking individual, that can easily crush any obstacle in her way. Things may get rough from time to time, but you got your lovely ladies and your loyal brats to back you up 100%. Keep your head up high and continue enjoying what you love, thanx for everything Bae<3

Congratulations to the one and only Harbinger of Chaos, the end of ends, the steel rose trapped in a cage of ice!

You have ascended to the legendary milestone of 1 million WITNESSES to the tempest of chaos that is you, Hakos Baelz! Your indomitable spirit and unwavering tenacity has forged a glorious path to greatness! We of the Rat Pack will follow you with great pride!

¡plɹoʍ ǝɥʇ ǝʞɐɥs llɐɥs no⅄ ˙ɹǝpɹo lɐɹnʇɐu ǝɥʇ sdɹnsn oɥʍ ǝɥs 'ǝsᴉɹ oʇ ǝnuᴉʇuoƆ

(On a scale of 1 to 10 how chuuni was that?)

messages.sender_title: the Weeb Friend to All Weebs
messages.message: Congratulations on reaching a million subscribers! It's been a chaotic rollercoaster the past years and I'm glad to hear the ride is still going. Hope to have many more years watching what you will make and as long as you're having fun, we're having fun!

messages.sender_title: Preeminent, superintending destiny with no oddity
messages.message: One large Caffè Latte with my favourite rat idol in the world please! Paying cash.
Thank you for being here and being my kamioshi. My favourite rat. JDON MY SOUL

messages.sender_title: The mysterious guy who prefer to not be known
messages.message: Congratulations on the 1 million sub Bae! I love whenever you are on stage, your dazzling stage presence gives off a power energy that I'm sure takes everyone's breath away! You show us that dreams can be achieved. If you put in hard work & effort, with abit of luck, dreams can come true! Keep on doing what you love & me along with the rest of the brats will continue cheering & supporting you! Let's aim for the 2 million sub next!

Congrats on 1milion Bae!! I've always been a quiet supporter and recently started gathering the courage to be a more active one. It's been such a pleasure to watch you grow, and you've been a big inspiration and source of comfort. Your hard work shows and pays off and I'm so proud to be able to watch you hit this big, very deserved milestone. Thank you for everything you do and the effort you put in. It doesn't go unnoticed. Keep doing your best, you're amazing!! I'm happy to be part of Brats!

Congrats on 1 Million subscribers!! It's been an amazing ride to watch your growth both as a streamer and entertainer. And I thank you for all the amount of hard work you put yourself through to make all of us smile. Your streams and singing light up my day everytime and moment, and I am very much looking forward to amazing accomplishment and goals are there for you. Keep being yourself Bae, I will continue to watch and cheer you on ❤️

CONGRATS BAE!!! I love you so much, I was disappointed I couldnt catch you at 5th fes and I was devastated when I couldnt go to dreamhack. But then my prayers were answered and YOU CAME RIGHT TO MY HOME IN SINGAPORE!!! I was just over the moon the day SOAR was announced. Your workaholic attitude makes me aspire to work hard like you too! (I am very lazy) P.S. Im the brat whose plushie landed on the side of the basket in Singapore! Smol but a memory I will cherish forever.
べ〜ちゃん！100万人！すご！おめでとう〜！かっこよくて可愛くて、いつも頑張ってるべ〜ちゃんは私の憧れです。何回大好きって言っても言いきれないくらいべ〜ちゃんのことすっごく大好き！！♡♡♡べ〜ちゃんのいろんな夢が叶いますように、夢を叶えるために頑張ってるべ〜ちゃんのことこれからもたくさん応援するからね！べ〜ちゃんいつもありがとう！(៸៸> <៸៸)
Congratulation on reaching 1M subs Bae!!! You are a very talented, hardworking, ambitious and kind little rat!

messages.sender_title: よせつ, the Twilight of Fey
messages.message:
Congratulations on reaching 1 million subscribers!! I’ll always be a fan supporting you.
Thank you for bringing us so much fun! Love you! ❤️
I had really bad depression earlier this year and your music really helped. Thank you for everything and congrats on 1M! ^^

Happy 1 million Bae! So proud of you! Been watching you since debut and you're an absolute blast. I love all of your karaoke streams and your comfy zatsus and also the really cool vlogs. Thanks for all that you do and keep on rocking it! Lots of love to ya!
Hiya Bae, new to your content but congrats on reaching 1Mil Subscribers. So happy for you 🥳❤️
Rat 👍
Bae, you have been working hard to gives us smiles that can last us a lifetime. Congrats on the 1M subscribers and I hope you can take some time off to relax. Don’t push yourself too hard.

messages.sender_title: Silent Echo of a Suave Exterminator
messages.message: Congratulations Bae on reaching 1M! You are such a cute, chuuni, dorky, and dedicated rat and I am so proud to boast you as my oshi! You are such an inspiration to all us brats for all that you have been able to achieve <3 We are grateful for all the coffee, blood, sweat, and tears (but mostly coffee XD) that you have sowed on our behalf to bring us smiles, wonder, and amazement. Us brats will always be here to cheer you on as there is still so much more of your chuuni story to tell! BAE IKZ <3

messages.sender_title: Rogue Rat Hoshiyomi, Member of the Sewer Rats Family, a Rat Pack Subsidary
messages.message:
Bae became my oshi after her first 3D appearance in 4th Fes! Since then, I've embraced every choreo that she creates and/or performs. After New York, I've come to realize how much she really means to me; not just in her choreo, but also in her immense talent, the way she talks, the hard work she puts in... and so much more.

To Bae: I wish I could've been there for the beginning of your journey. Even then, please let me show you my support now. You deserve to know how much your brats love you!
yeet the rat TODO finish this

Bae, your passion and drive for your work is awe-inspiring, I’m so happy to have found you! Thank you for the countless hours of entertainment and happiness (and absolute banger-ass music and performances) you’ve given us! I’ll cherish these memories always and am looking forward to supporting you for the long haul :) 大ちゅき！

messages.sender_title: International Underground Fan of Bae, the Slumber Crown
messages.message: Congratulations Bae on hitting one million subs! Very proud of how much you've grown as a streamer and idol over the past 3 years! Your 3D work is a delight and it's amazing to see you work it, but please also make sure to look after your health. I'm looking forward to seeing you continue your idol rat journey!

Along with Kiryu Kazuma, You’ve been one of my biggest inspirations to be creative (i.e making song covers and doing fight choreography videos). How convenient it was for me when you started playing the Yakuza games back in Dec 2023! From watching you perform and chat, I learned the real value of chuuni: Without it, you lose your sense of childlike wonder, something we could all use. I hope we can see you continue to put in 110% (after taking the proper rest lol).

messages.sender_title: the radiant dawn, bringer of light
messages.message: Hi Bae! I would only occasionally catch some clips or moments of Holo-members on Youtube and Twitter, however recently that changed and you are a very large reason behind said change. Your grit, endurance, optimism and sheer perseverance were incredibly inspiring and made me want to do better day by day. Despite being a new brat, I'm just as proud as everyone seeing you come this far. I can't wait to see what else you have in store for us!

CONGRATULATION TO 1 MILLION SUBS!

I want to say thank you for making everyday fun and never boring. Every time you go live I enjoy it to the fullest in sickness and health you always bring me a smile and truly make me and so many others part of a big loving family and I really enjoy being part of this Family and Journey. As a new Brat, only 5 months in, you made a Truly huge impact in my life even in that short time. I'm Always happy and made new friends just because of you.

SO THANK YOU, BAE
I started watching you this past year. you've done a lot in this year. i'm glad you can do a lot. you've saved my life. you always bring joy and smile to me. Love you Bae. Jangan lupa istirahat!

messages.sender_title: "The end and the Beggining, the Alpha and the Omega"
messages.message:
Since Council first debuted you always caught my eye not only because of your design but because of how peculiar your attitude was, and when I finally started watching your streams on September of this year I was amazed at how entertaining your streams were for me and how much fun I was having, you truly clicked in a different way for me to the point you were the first membership I bought since I first watched hololive back in 2020
A thousand congratulations for 1 million, here's to many more!

It's no exaggeration that when Psycho came out, it set in motion a lot of change in my life. Because of that song I flew to America from England to see Connect the World; I was no longer just a casual fan like I had thought. Being more in the community I was able to meet a bunch of new people, people with the same interests as me and people that won't judge me for what I like. Thank you for everything, ペールズ ❤️🎲
Congrats on 1 MILLION Subbies!!!! Hope to be there for the next milestones in Hololive. Thanks for being my Kami Oshi!!
Congrats on 1 million Bae. You deserve it for all the hard work you put in and the amazing community you've built up.
チャンネル登録者100万人おめでとう！🎉最推しのべーちゃんがどんどん有名になって本当に嬉しいことこの上ないです！！べーちゃんから元気をいっぱい貰っている身として、これからもいっぱい応援するよ！活動頑張ってね！！

Congrats on 1 Million Bae!!! Having 1 Million subscribers is such a massive milestone - it's difficult to even comprehend. You have put so much effort into everything you do and have so much passion for absolutely everything. Keep on being amazing!!!

Congratz on 1M!!! I only became a Brat early this year, but it has been incredible! 
Your song and dance performances has made me a brat for life, and watching your adventures in VCR Rust was one of my favorite moments.
Can't wait to see what chaos you will bring in the future <3
Congratulations on reaching 1 million subscribers! We look forward to your future endeavors.

GentleRats, the moment has finally come. Look at all these mice! 1 Millions got together, A millions! All these rats are gathering for you, our best friend, Rat of the chaos. 
Our shrewmouse has reached a million subscribers. I love you always and thank you. You've always been a popular rat, and I'm glad to see you have more and more fans around the world. Congratulations the 1mil and I'm rooting gor you from a little mouse in a city in South Korea.

messages.sender_title: The brat that runs the frat
messages.message: Hi bae! I have been a fan since council from that tiny and shy chaotic little rat to a still tiny but confident rat (still chaotic ofc).Your streams never fail to put a smile on my face even during some days where smiling is hard.Words can't express how much joy you have given to us brats and words also can't express how proud we are now that you have gotten 1M subs! (been a long time coming). Congratulations Bae,  you deserve it! Onwards to 2M subs!!

Hello Bae！Congrats for 1M subs！Can't believe it's has been 3years！That's means I've meet my Oshi has been 3years！I'm not good at English expression but！Thank you for everything you work hard for us！Thank you being my part of life, it's happy to watch your stream everytime after woring; can't image what will I be if I didn't meet you.I love your dancing, singing, laughing, 雜談, everything, I'm so appreciate that I can meet you :D Please keep going I'll keep supporting you ！ 謝謝妳！我愛妳！加油！
Congratulations on passing 1 million subs! Next... the whole world shall bow down to you! XD

Bae! HUGE congrats on achieving 1 million subs! I've been following you since debut and it's incredible how much you've grown in that time, both as a streamer and a performer! Words cannot even begin to describe how proud I am of you! Me and the rest of the Brats will always be by your side to cheer you on! Ganbatte!
For One of the Brats, I really am proud of you. Bae. 1M is special line. Congratulation!

Wazzup Bae! I started watching VTubers a little over a year ago, and you became my Kami-oshi in the second month! I love all the songs you release, and how entertaining you are. I just wanted to thank you for all the hard work you put in, and inspiring me to learn Japanese, aswell as learn how to sing. Please remember that it's okay to take a break whenever you need to. Ganbare Bae!

Hi Bae!!! Congrats on One Million Subscribers!!! Thanks for being our chunni dancer rat this entire time and hopefully for more years to come. I'll never forget the amount of energy you brought all the way back during Connect the World and after watching you perform at ANYC SOAR and Breaking Dimensions I was just stunned at everything.

BaeMillion Congratulations!!!
歌も、ダンスも、ZATSUも、ときどき起こるカオスも、ぜんぶ大好きだ！
いつもがんばってるべーちゃんを、100万人のBratsはいつでもいくらでも応援するからねー！！

Congratulations on a million subs Bae. I've been around since debut and it's been really cool seeing you grow and all the projects you put out. I always like the music and I listen to Zodiac quite a bit, but others are memorable too... Some 'VN' type videos, the recent 24 hour stream, and of course Chu2bae! Not entirely sure how to word it but I guess I can say I'm impressed by it all, and I'm glad I've been able to be along for the ride. Looking forward to seeing where you go from here!

messages.sender_title: The flame of the end that will burn the world down
messages.message: 우리의 귀여운 땃쥐 베이짱!!구독자 100만 달성 정말로 축하해요!!언제나 베이의 재밌는 방송과 베이의 좋은 목소리로 불러주는 좋은 노래들 덕분에 힘을 얻고있어요!!앞으로도 베이가 하는 모든 활동을 진심으로 지지하고 서포트하고 응원할게요 화이팅!!다시한번 구독자 100만명 축하해요!!

messages.sender_title: Solemn Snake of the Yakkai Pits
messages.message: You will always have a special place in my heart as my first oshi Bae. I love your dancing, and I appreciate how hard you work to make us happy. Keep it up, but take better care of yourself! JDON MY SOUL!!!

messages.sender_title: The Rat's Crimson Blade, slayer of JDON
messages.message: Bae, it's been an amazing ride ever since your debut, it's crazy to see how much you accomplished so far, I'll always remember your performance during the Our Bright Parade festival as one of the best I've ever seen ! As someone that has been there since the early days of council (and remembers EN curse that pushed your debut one day later), Seeing you reach the million subscribers makes me only scream two words : MUCH DESERVED !

messages.sender_title: Fighter Pilot Chaos on Duty o7
messages.message:
A video clip link of a favorite moment with BaeRyS in sync as that is the best moment to cherish the close friendship together in its the finest on a good game of Mario Party Jamboree (even though the game is rigged) but the good times together is peak from your Bae 24 hour stream.

BaeRyS for the win and congratulations on reaching that million milestone too !! :) o7

messages.sender_title: Coffee is my blood, caffeine is my soul
messages.message: Congratulations for 1M subscribers, Bae! I'm always looking forward to see you sing and dance on the stage, your performance is always amazing! Keep doing your best and love you, Bae!

messages.sender_title: 1st Lieutenant of the Brazilian Brat Platoon
messages.message: Congratulations on the BEEG 1M milestone Bae! I always believed you would achieve such a monumental achievement, since you're such a hard-working, kind and amazing person. You truly inspire me and the other brats to always give our best in life, and I'm very proud to have you as my kami-oshi. Here's to many more millions in the future!

messages.sender_title: Bearing the Rat's Word to faraway lands.
messages.message:
Hey, RAT! How it feels to be the chuunibyou? I know, it sounds strange, but thanks to you I finally accepted my inner chuunibyou! I was living a boring grey life before finding your channel. I was trying to be the most serious man. But now? I accepted myself, and I can say PP jokes to everyone without cringing! It was a slow change, but still!
Anyway, thank you very much! I wish you everything nice and good! Have fun! Do not overexaggerate yourself, we want to see you alive!

Bae, you always say 1mil is like a dream, but here we are now. You got it. You achieve it! I know you can do it cuz you push yourself to the limit this year. Everything finally payoff now, I'm more than proud to Witness your success today. Never give up, life is rough sometimes, but we can make it together, Bae. I always will be here to support you for you're my kamioshi!(≧ω≦。)/
Congratulations on 1 million!
Placeholder

hiya bae !!! congrats on a million subs !!!
it’s so cool to see you get this far, especially after you’ve genuinely helped me in the past few years. you’ve been such a huge inspo and motivation for me and many others, and honestly i can’t thank you enough, even if i’m not that active in chat at all lmao
Congrats on this reaching this huge milestone Bae 2M here we come! ♥️💛🩵🤍🖤

messages.sender_title: The Man in the Velvet Tailcoat
messages.message: As an entertainer and performance artist, your growth these past years has been breathtaking and being a part of your journey has brought so many great moments that I will treasure. The pursuit of art is a process and you go from strength to strength, and despite the stress and that comes with it, always know that we are behind you all the way. The best prize is to see you smile - whether in pride after a crazy live performance, or after making a dumb joke, and thank you for giving us so many!
Congratulations Bae! We are all so proud of you! Thank you for being you!

Just wanted to hop in and say: all talents in cover are idols, who can sing and dance, but only a small handful of them can really be called "DANCERS" and you're one of them. Its freakin awesome what a great dancer you are and how much you do. It's always a joy to watch you in 3D at what I think is your strongest, especially since you're always looking for new ways to show what you've got. Love watchin ya do what you love and I'm gonna try harder to do what I want too, thanks for bein awesome!

messages.sender_title: reincarnated 9 tailed fox, bringer of mischieve and chaos upon world
messages.message: I love all you have done, you did your best and we'll always be grateful for everything you've done for us. Dont push too hard and have a nice rest if needed. love you!

Hi Bae, Congrats on 1mln brats! We, your subject my queen, are happy for YOUR BIG SUCCESS! Also, if frientaro is next to you reading this message, please let her give you big hug and headpat! (And maybe to tell you "you did a good job" in soft voice) Because you deserve it! All the hard work to gather 1mln rat army finally showed the fruits. Now world domination is possible! Or maybe just a brekkie at Macs, idk, anyway! Happy 1 mln, do not overwork yourself, get some sleep and yeet Nephilim...

congratulations to my favorite rat, 
Ever since I discovered hololive as a whole and discovering your channel, it was the best thing that ever happened to me, with the streams you been doing and the concerts and music you developed, you deserve getting to 1 Million, your effort and everything you have accomplished has shown over the year and I say, you deserve every piece of it, once again Congrats bae <3

messages.sender_title: Shining Jeff Master（閃光のジェフマスター）
messages.message: ベーちゃん‼️登録者100万人おめでとうございます‼️

Watching you grow, shine, and embrace everything you’ve worked so hard for fills my heart with so much joy Bae! I still cannot believe I travelled half the world to se you and the brats at BD. the community you have build is so funny, welcoming and chaotic that I feel at home even if my english is not my first language. Please always remember that we're proud of you and that you have little brats in every corner of the world. I'm bad with words but I hope this drawing transmits my passion
Congrats! Worldwide Rat (´,,•ω•,,)♡

messages.sender_title: The Aussie Connoisseur of Games, Memes, and Tim Tams
messages.message:
G'day Bae! Massive congratulations on reaching the 1 million subscriber milestone!
For three years, you've overslept for streams, conquered game after game, created both hype and emotionally-driven songs, danced your heart out on stage, and done everything in between.
I respect you so much for how hard you work on and off-stream, and seeing your creativity come to life motivates me to want to do the same. You're such a gem and deserve all the love and praise. Keep being awesome!
KAY BYE o/
Congrats on 1million sub!! Gambare Bae!!

Heyo bae! Congrats on 1 million subs!!!! I have loved seeing you grow and get better and better at everything since the beginning, and can’t wait for the OG friendtaro stream and 6th fes. Excited to see what you cook up for 2025, hopefully a bae and bancho performance 👀. Us brats love you bae!!! Keep doing what you love!

messages.sender_title: Starborn, Herald of the Cosmic Dawn
messages.message: Hi Bae, I'm writing this while watching your 1 million endurance stream, I'm sure everyone's already told you this, but we'll say it again and again! We're so proud of you!!! You made it really far and you touched our hearts, this is a moment to cherish since this is all thanks to your determination and efforts to get this far, your own strength is what got you here, and we'll always be there to Witness you!!! LOVE YOU BAE!!!

"Huge congratulations on 1 million subs, Bae! You have come so far in your idol journey and have been a true inspiration to so many around the world! As one of the many who have WITNESSED you, I am truly glad to be a proud Brat because I got to know and interact with so many amazing folks while watching your journey, which I would never have imagined to be possible for a shy introvert like myself. You have an exciting future ahead with new heights to climb, so keep chasing your dreams, Bae!"

Congratulations on 1million subs!! I really love seeing you dance and Im always looking forward to see you perform on stage! You are very special and you filled a big part of me by just being yourself. Thank you for working so hard for us. I appreciate everything you do. <3

O GREAT CHAOS, Harbinger of Entropy, Echoes of Pandemonium, and Dancer of the Fractured Realm. With one million souls now pledged to thee, thy power grows, an unstoppable tide. Thy efforts blaze bright in the hearts of mortals, heralding thy ascension. The realms tremble as thy power shatters order. Take thy rightful throne and rule as master of all. Thy reign shall echo eternal, a hymn of chaos unmatched and unchallenged.

congrats on 1 mil bae ;p

messages.sender_title: Lord of the night and day
messages.message: What's up little Bae ! Congrats becoming a 1 million hot gamer girl!

Happy 1 million subs milestone!!!
Although I have only been watching for around a year, your energy and voice truly captivated me and I hope that you continue to enjoy what you do and keep having fun with everyone that accompanies you along this incredible journey.I also hope that all the fellow Brats messages will bring you just a smidge of the joy and happiness you give us when you go live or perform.
Always stay true to your effervescent self and we will follow you to the End of Ends!! (heh)

messages.sender_title: The Bringer of Nights and Feasts
messages.message:
Congrats on 1 Million Subs!
Thank you for all the fun streams and bringing the light and joy into every single one of your Brats life's! I have been watching since Debut and I have enjoyed your journey to 1 million. Thank you for everything and here's to a million more!!

Hi Bae, congratulations on making it to a million! So many great songs and such masterful dancing have marked the long path here. I'm not sure how much longer that cage of ice can contain you with all this fire content, but I look forward to the day that steel rose stands unbound! Here's to another year with our rat!

Congratulations on hitting one million Bae! You have worked so hard this year and i couldnt be more proud of you. I'm so glad to call you my kami oshi! Thank you for everything you've done for us brats!

messages.sender_title: Maker of That Which You Behold
messages.message: Brat of few words back again. Am I only going to show up for fan projects? Haha. It's not new, but here's a coloured version of that doodle Mumei did a while back. I also had a lot of fun working on this site. So I hope all the messages from the brats and the rest of the site helps make the 1M celebration just that more joyful. Congrats on 1M subscribers, and here's to many more rats to come!

Congratulations Hakos Baelz The End of Ends, A Steel Rose trapped in a Cage of Ice for reaching 1 million subscribers! Wooooo~ You really come so far and be able to achieve this big milestone I'm really proud of you as a fan. Your performance on stage always amazed me, it shows me how much you practice for every show you did. Thank you so much for your hard work and never giving up on your dream. I'm really grateful to be part of this awesome community. Brat for life!

Congrats on 1 million subscribers, Bae!

Watching you grow as an idol and streamer—from your 3D debut to Soar and BD—has been awe-inspiring. Seeing you perform live and hanging out with the brats are memories I’ll never forget. I can't put into words how proud I am to have you as my kami oshi. I'll support you for as long as I can!

Your dancing even got me into dance games—I recently FC’d RxRxR! Thanks for inspiring new hobbies and helping me meet awesome people beyond hololive and vtubers!

messages.sender_title: Haunting, a spirit dwelling from within the deepest darkness, wanderer of the eternal abyss
messages.message:
Congratulations on 1 million subscribers Bae!
It has been a delight watching your streams, vlogs, concert performances, and listening to you music! I hope you do something special for yourself celebrating this major achievement, and continue to have fun pursuing your goals!

Congrats on the well deserved 1mil Bae!! Thank you for all the fun and creative streams during these years. And of course thank you for the amazing songs and performances since they are the ones that really hooked me into the music and idoly side of Hololive and even got me to travel across the world to NYC to see you girls perform

The journey to 1 Million has bin a long one, but no one deservs it more than you for working nonstop and hard. I have watched you since you´re debut, but it wasn´t until New Years eve of 2023 i decided to make you my kamioshi. Thanks to you, this year has bin one of the best and most memorable in my life. You are someone that i really look up to very much and i pray for good luck to you for the upcoming years and the next 1 million subs. Thank you from the bottom of my heart, from KnifeMan.

i'm bad with words, i just what to congratulate you in this awesome milestone: 1 millon brats! you deserve every single one and more. thank you for always make smile, thank you for all the fun, entertaining, creative, wholesome things you do, you workaholic rat. let's go and get another millon next!

You always said you didn't believe this moment would come, but I thought you deserved it.
Since I got to know you, my life has become brighter and more enjoyable. I love this hard working dancing rat. 축하해요. 사랑해요!

messages.sender_title: 六神将, 鮮血のパイン
messages.message: All of your hard work over the years has always been a huge inspiration to me. Seeing you push yourself every day to live your dream and give back to your fans gave me the motivation to push myself even harder and try so many new things, like travelling to see you live! I can say with confidence that out of those million subs, you’ve changed the life of this one (and many more!) for the better. I hope I get to keep working hard alongside you for many years to come; here’s to the next million!

messages.sender_title: The... what is it? I forgor
messages.message:
Hello and WAZZUP!!

First off, I wanna say... Congrats for one... MILLION... BRATS!!! You truly deserve to reach it from all the hard work you did, and for being the best and the most chuuni idol rat in the town!

Secondly, it's unbelievable that somehow, it's been 3 years since you and the rest of Council debuted. It only feels like a year had passed. The last 3 years together with us brats has been an amazing ride and I hope it'll get even better for years to come :DD

messages.sender_title: Angel of Nature, Protector of all that is Natural!
messages.message: Congratulations to my second favorite Aussie for hitting 100万円人!~  Seriously though, this is a huge milestone and you should be PROUD!

I've only been watching your streams regularly since the Mario Kart tourney this past January(in fact that was the first video I watched this year!). I often kick myself over spending the better part of the last three years only watching clips or the odd big collab when they happened, but ultimately I'm glad to be here and wouldn't give up watching the cutest idol rat for anything! The clip I included is one of the most comforting things I've ever experienced in your streams. STREAM KOKORONASHI!

messages.sender_title: Representative from the Land of Rising Dragons
messages.message:
Dear Hakos Baelz - Our Beloved Chaos
Since debut, you have always stand out to me. At the beginning, I didn't feel attracted with your unique design (which actually fits your "Chaos" theme). But then, you have grown on me. Your voice is so nice; it feels so heart-warming and captivating (the accent is lit XD). I also love your energetic but still kinda chill vibe, your great humour, and your caring heart. You're my kamioshi, you're the saviour of my life. Thank you!
Once a Brat, forever a Brat!

Congratulations on your milestone! It felt not so long ago since Council debuted, so proud to see the silly rat become the (silly) idol rat today. Best wishes to everything you want to accomplish and remember to be happy!! Boom Boom Boom!!!

messages.sender_title: The Mysterious Champion Hero of the future
messages.message:
Well Bae, you finally did it! You've successfully reached 1 Million Subscribers!!!! It took ages but I always knew you would get 1M subs one day and you truly deserve it for so many reasons! I think it's only fitting that the clip I'll share here is how I discovered you and became one of your loyal fans, there are many memories but this one I will always remember.

Thank you so much for everything! Congratulations for getting 1 Million subs! 

From your British Brat
Zyrob{Codename:Zyro-B}

messages.sender_title: The Everlasting Flame and The Eater of Worlds
messages.message: Congrats on reaching 1 million subscribers, Bae!!! You absolutely deserve it!!! You’re such a hard working & talented person, you always put 100% into everything you do!!! I always enjoy listening to your songs & watching your streams!! They brighten up my days so much, thank you!!! I’m so proud to be a Brat & I’ll continue to support you as much as I can!!! Here’s to many more amazing songs, incredible performances, & making more awesome memories with you & all the Brats!!! Love ya, Bae!! ❤️

messages.sender_title: JRPG Protagonist, Knight of the Void, Lord of the Dad Joke, Internet Dad Extraordinaire
messages.message:
Congrats on reaching 1 million subs! I knew this day would come eventually and I am so proud of you for reaching this goal. Truth be told I was a lurker for a really long time but seeing you perform, being able to meet you at a meet and greet, watching you give everything your all and never back down from a challenge inspired me to become a bigger part of the community. 

Your courage and determination never ceases to amaze and make me want to do better. Thanks Worldwide Rat Idol, My Kamioshi, love you Bae!

messages.sender_title: The Lord of Beaches, upon which the crumbled mountains of Order meet the fathomless seas of Chaos. He who watches at the border of the finite and infinite.
messages.message: Congrats on one million Bae! Much deserved as you're always bringing so much creativity, effort, and fun. Even when you can't seem to speak any language at all, your sense of humor always means you're speaking *my* language. It's been a joy watching your journey so far and I hope to keep watching, and being a small part of, your journey in the future!

messages.sender_title: Progenitor of Cringe and Bad Jokes
messages.message:
Congratulations on reaching 1 million subs, Bae!  It is such a well-deserved achievement after all your hard work.  Your commitment to providing great content and your strive to improve is truly admirable.  With every project and new event you provide, you continue to show just how talented and amazing you really are! Us Brats couldn't have found a better oshi! I am excited to see you reach even greater heights that I know you are capable of!

Much love, Bae!
Congratulations on 1 Million! You deserve it! ❤️❤️❤️

it's been a long time coming, but you've finally made it! you've singlehandedly changed the lives of so many brats, and watching you grow from a small rat to the chuuni rat we see today fills us with pride! (yes, i used the P-word, ban me >:3) work hard, play hard, and most importantly, rest well!
Congrats on hitting a million, boss! You continue to be an inspiration for me and many other brrats to work our hardest in pursuing our own dreams. Thank you for being such an amazing rat!

messages.sender_title: The one of many apprentices of chaos
messages.message: Your chunnieness is cool and I'm happy to be a sewer rat, and I hope you and your friends have an amazing year and many more to come much love.

CONGRATS ON YOUR 1MIL SUBS, BAE!!🥳 You have been working hard for us for the past 3 years with entertaining streams, releasing banger musics and showing spectacular performances. I really look up to you as a dancer and performer and I wish for nothing but the best for you from now till the future!!! GAMBATTE IDOLRAT!! JDON MY SOUL!!!

Thank you for all you do. I can't tell you how many times you brightened my day with your infectious laugh or something funny you shared. Your singing is a delight and has picked me up when I had a bad shift at the firehouse more times than I can remember. You are very much loved and appreciated. Thank you so much for just being you.

Your streams have really pulled me out of a slump so despite the massive time difference (your timezone is 8 hours ahead of mine) I still try to make sure I can catch you live. Thank you for all that you do and all of your hard work. Much love from the Netherlands ❤️

PS: 'Weight of the world' cover when? 👀
Congratulations, Bae, on reaching 1 million subscribers! You are NO1 idol rat. I'm looking forward to the songs you'll create in the future and the dances you'll perform during live shows.

messages.sender_title: Vassal of the Lord of Blades
messages.message:
Congratulations on 1 million subs Bae!!!! I’ve been a huge fan since discovering you almost 2 years ago now. I am always so impressed by how much you do! I’m excited to see what the future holds! Next to 2 million!!!  

Couldn’t be a more proud to be a Brat!

I'm so sorry I wrote it in Korean, but I really wanted to say it as Korean!
데뷔 방송부터 봤던게 벌써 몇년전이네요. 처음에 Bae를 만났을때가 생각나요 그 전까지는 버튜버에 대해서 알고는 있었지만 이렇게 빠지게 될줄은 몰랐어요. Bae는 너무 열정적인 아이돌이에요, 처음에는 그냥 마냥 개구장이 텐션 높은 친구인줄 알았는데 매년매년 새로운 모습을 볼 수 있어서 놀라웠어요. 매일매일 바쁘게 사느라 방송을 보는 횟수가 줄어서 너무 슬프지만 언제나 응원하고 있으니까, 제가 채팅창이나 트위터에서 없어졌다고 해서 한명의 Brats를 잃었나 하고 안슬퍼했으면 좋겠어요! 솔로라이브 꼭 했으면 좋겠어요... 화이팅!

messages.sender_title: Brat of Speedrun Abyss, the Jumping Revenant
messages.message:
Congrats to our beloved Bae-chan for reaching 1M subs! 🎉🐭
Your passion and charm have captured so many hearts. From your debut to today, we’ve watched our favorite idol rat work hard and achieve milestone after milestone. It’s been an inspiring and proud journey to witness.
Thank you for creating those heartfelt memories for us.
There’s still so much to look forward to, and we can’t wait to see how amazing you’ll be next!

Keep going, Bae! We’ll always be your strongest supporters!

おい Bae,
I don't know vtubing for long now, but I wanted to say thank u for being my first oshi, who inspired me to watch a lot of other members, and Im so thankful for the community we have all around hololive...
Even tho my timezone is kinda f**ked up to watch your streams, I try to watch every single one of them, cause they really make me relax. And god, your dancing and singing is great.
You inspired me to learn JP and trying to get to the 6th fes.
Grüße aus Deutschland🇩🇪❤️🎲
ありがとう　じゃあまた

messages.sender_title: Duke of the Sewers, GWS Pill Supplier, He Whose Username Appears to Rats to Contain an S in the Middle but Does Not
messages.message: I discovered hololive production nearly five years ago now. I used to say "so-and-so is my favorite," and I thought the people talking about "oshis" were just using frivolous Japanese. I had heard that "oshi" literally means "push," as in "someone you want to push to succeed." But I didn't really get it until, because of you, I FELT it . Ever since that day, I am proud to call you my oshi. Celebrate this milestone - you've earned it.

CONGRATS ON 1 MILLION SUBS BAE!!! I always knew you would reach this milestone and now that its here I couldn't be more proud! Thank you for always being your cheerful and chuuni self and never failing to brighten my day. I look forward to whatever you got cooking in the future. (and 2 Mil subs maybe?) TAKE CARE, MY OSHI!!!

-Razor

Congrats BAE on hitting 1mil! 
Seeing you always giving your 200% on practices, streams and performance, really inspires me to slowly picking up my own dreams and goals as well.

Knowing someone like you who holds dear to their dreams and goals. Makes me really want to keep supporting you and see what the future bring us.

You may think that we Brats are the only ones giving you support and encouragement, but let me ensure you this goes both ways. YOU makes us want to be better too!
Thank you for everything you have done Bae and Congrats on 1million subs im so proud to see how far you have come and i can’t wait to see more that you have in store for all of us Brats❤️❤️❤️

messages.sender_title: *to be added when not actively running around trying to finish my stuff*
messages.message: *to be added when not actively running around trying to finish my stuff*

Hi Bae! Happy 1 million! What a crazy journey it has been! I've been a member for a little more than 2 years but I think in my heart I've been a fan since your debut. One day it had dawned upon me, what the hell am I doing? I've never missed a single stream of this girls' since her debut. Every zatsudan a joy, every gaming stream a great time, every song a bop, it's been a pleasure to be one of your fans on this wild ride. Here's to much more, thank you for brightening up our days and our lives
You will always be our oshi no matter what
—working on it!
Respect your grind you lovely rat❤️

Hi Bae! Congrats to 1 million brats! I have followed you since that debut where you blew out our expectations of what we can expect from you. You have grown from strength to strength, and we are SO, SO, SO proud of you. 2025 will be a great one for you, I know it. Thank you for coming into our lives and making it better in every way.

Congratulations on reaching 1 Million subs Bae! Thank you for being an inspiration for me and all the other Brats. Your energy is contagious and you are always giving it your all and that's what me and I'm sure most of us love about you. I always enjoy watching you perform  live and I'm glad I got to witness you perform twice in person. Not gonna lie, you made me want to pick up dancing again. I will always continue to support you and I will do my best to catch more of your lives in person.

Congrats on 1M Hakos! It's been quite a journey watching you grow
Thank you for all the entertainment and effort you've put in these 3.5 years
Here's to 2025! 兄弟！！
Hi Bae, congrats on getting a million subs! You're my favourite rat of all time, and I look forward to more fun and chaos!

Thank you for being you, Bae!
p.s. It's time to go on a Janken Training Arc.
Rat is Love, Rat is Life ❤️
Thank you Bae for being an inspiration and guiding light to motivate me to always do my best. I will always support you and your Chuuni ways. Sasuga Idol Rat
